languages.text: {n}Взгляд Мастера дисциплины мрачен, а губы поджаты — из глаз женщины сочится свирепая ярость. Отточенным движением она снимает с пояса булаву и протягивает вам.{/n} "Это — непростительный промах. Я принимаю ответственность за него и прошу о наказании".

{n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Мастера дисциплины мрачен, а губы поджаты — из глаз женщины сочится свирепая ярость. Отточенным движением она снимает с пояса булаву и протягивает вам.{/n} "Это — непростительный промах. Я принимаю ответственность за него и прошу о наказании".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, and her lips are pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

{n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, and her lips are pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

{n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

{n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

{n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

{n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas rezuma una furia siniestra con su mirada hosca y sus labios apretados. Con un movimiento fluido, se saca la maza del cinturón y te la ofrece.{/n} «Un error imperdonable. Acepto toda la responsabilidad y solicito el castigo apropiado».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas rezuma una furia siniestra con su mirada hosca y sus labios apretados. Con un movimiento fluido, se saca la maza del cinturón y te la ofrece.{/n} «Un error imperdonable. Acepto toda la responsabilidad y solicito el castigo apropiado».

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは苛烈な怒りを放つ。目は暗く、唇は固く轢き結ばれている。慣れた手つきで、彼女はベルトからモールを外し、あなたへと差し出す。{/n}「許されない間違いです。 私は全責任を認め、しかるべき処罰を求めます」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは苛烈な怒りを放つ。目は暗く、唇は固く轢き結ばれている。慣れた手つきで、彼女はベルトからモールを外し、あなたへと差し出す。{/n}「許されない間違いです。 私は全責任を認め、しかるべき処罰を求めます」

languages.text: {n}戒律大师浑身上下散发着阴沉的怒意，双眼漆黑，嘴唇紧抿。她以熟练的动作取下了腰间的战锤，递给了你。{/n}“这是个不可原谅的错误，我愿意承担所有责任。请您赐予我应得的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师浑身上下散发着阴沉的怒意，双眼漆黑，嘴唇紧抿。她以熟练的动作取下了腰间的战锤，递给了你。{/n}“这是个不可原谅的错误，我愿意承担所有责任。请您赐予我应得的惩罚。”

languages.text: {n}Der Waffenmeister strahlt Zorn aus – ihre Augen sind dunkel, ihre Lippen verzogen. Mit geübter Hand nimmt sie den Streitkolben vom Gürtel und reicht ihn dir.{/n} "Ein unverzeihlicher Fehler. Ich übernehme die volle Verantwortung und bitte um angemessene Bestrafung."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Waffenmeister strahlt Zorn aus – ihre Augen sind dunkel, ihre Lippen verzogen. Mit geübter Hand nimmt sie den Streitkolben vom Gürtel und reicht ihn dir.{/n} "Ein unverzeihlicher Fehler. Ich übernehme die volle Verantwortung und bitte um angemessene Bestrafung."

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes, animée d'une fureur sinistre, pince les lèvres avec un regard sombre. D'une main experte, elle retire la masse de sa ceinture et vous la tend.{/n} « Une erreur impardonnable. J'en assume l'entière responsabilité et demande à être châtiée comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes, animée d'une fureur sinistre, pince les lèvres avec un regard sombre. D'une main experte, elle retire la masse de sa ceinture et vous la tend.{/n} « Une erreur impardonnable. J'en assume l'entière responsabilité et demande à être châtiée comme il se doit. »

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, haşin bir öfkeyle için için kavruluyor. Gözleri kararmış, dudakları büzülmüş durumda. Eğitimli bir hareketle kemerindeki tokmağı çıkarıp sana takdim ediyor.{/n} "Affedilemez bir hata. Tüm sorumluluğu kabul ediyor ve gerekli cezanın verilmesini talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms radiates grim fury — her eyes are dark, her lips pursed. With a practised hand, she removes the maul from her belt and offers it to you.{/n} "An unforgivable error. I accept full responsibility and ask for due punishment."
